subject: Mental Health
title: Eating Disorders in Men
description: Learn Eating Disorders in Men in one minute.

hook.text: One in three people with eating disorders is male. Most will never be diagnosed.

buildup.text: Male eating disorders often focus on muscularity rather than thinness.

discovery.text: Muscle dysmorphia â€” the drive for extreme muscularity â€” is a growing male-specific concern.

twist.text: Stigma and the myth that eating disorders are a women's problem prevent men from seeking help.

climax.text: Men with eating disorders have higher mortality rates partly due to delayed diagnosis.

punchline.text: The disorder doesn't discriminate. The diagnosis does.
